bibdata.title: Automated Cryptographic Validation Protocol (ACVP) JSON Specification
Automated Cryptographic Validation Protocol (ACVP) JSON Specification
bibdata.docidentifier: Automated Cryptographic Validation Protocol SPEC Revision 1

organization.name: Cisco Systems, Inc.
Information Technology Laboratory
organization.subdivision: Computer Security Division

organization.name: Information Technology Laboratory
organization.subdivision: Computer Security Division

organization.name: National Institute of Standards and Technology
organization.subdivision: Computer Security Division, Information Technology Laboratory

abstract.p: The ACV Protocol provides a method for communication between a cryptographic module that is embedded inside of a device or otherwise running on a platform accessible via computer network, and an external testing system, using standard network communication interfaces and protocols. This communication protocol can also be used to validate the correctness of the algorithm implementations in the cryptographic module with a validation authority.

organization.name: National Institute of Standards and Technology
